mapper.select: /* isDesignLayerKeyDuplication */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END AS duplication FROM design_layer WHERE design_layer_key = #{value}
/* getMaxViewOrderChildDesignLayer */ SELECT * FROM design_ayer WHERE parent = #{parent} ORDER BY view_order DESC LIMIT 1
/* getChildDesignLayerCount */ SELECT COUNT(design_layer_id) FROM design_layer WHERE parent = #{designLayerId}
mapper.delete: /* deleteDesignLayer */ DELETE FROM design_layer WHERE design_layer_id = #{designLayerId}
